person.persName: Elijah Harrison Hopper (Christian County, Kentucky, merchant.)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Son of William Hopper and Edith Harrison Hopper. Married to Harriet M. Bryan Hopper in Christian County, Kentucky, on February 2, 1848. Father of Harrison Hopper, Caroline Hopper, Edith Hopper, Susan Hopper, Bryan Hopper, Bettie Hopper, and Harriet Hopper. Merchant in Christian County in 1850. Owned six enslaved persons in Christian County in 1850. Merchant in Christian County in 1860. Owned eight enslaved persons in Christian County 1860.
